net.prasenjit.crypto

Interface TextEncryptor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Encryptor
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    E2eEncryptor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSymmetricEncryptor, AesEncryptor, AesOverRsaEncryptor, DesedeEncryptor, PBEEncryptor, RsaEncryptor

    public interface TextEncryptor
extends Encryptor
    This interface is used to encrypt text data, considering the encoding. Created on 06-06-2017.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    prasenjit

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default String decrypt(String data)
      Decrypt a text with default utf-8 charset.
      default String decrypt(String data, Charset charset)
      Decrypt a text with provided charset.
      default String encrypt(String data)
      Encrypt a text with default utf-8 charset.
      default String encrypt(String data, Charset charset)
      Encrypt a text with provided charset.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.prasenjit.crypto.Encryptor

        decrypt, encrypt

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        default String encrypt(String data)

        Encrypt a text with default utf-8 charset.

        Parameters:
        data - a String to be encrypted.
        Returns:
        a String Base64 encoded encrypted text.

      • decrypt

        default String decrypt(String data)

        Decrypt a text with default utf-8 charset.

        Parameters:
        data - a String encrypted and Base64 encoded.
        Returns:
        a String as decrypted text.

      • encrypt

        default String encrypt(String data,
                       Charset charset)

        Encrypt a text with provided charset.

        Parameters:
        data - a String to be encrypted.
        charset - a Charset to convert to byte array.
        Returns:
        a String Base64 encoded encrypted text.
        Since:
        1.1

      • decrypt

        default String decrypt(String data,
                       Charset charset)

        Decrypt a text with provided charset.

        Parameters:
        data - a String encrypted and Base64 encoded.
        charset - a Charset to construct text.
        Returns:
        a String as decrypted text.
        Since:
        1.1
